description: Returns the tags associated with a file system. The order of tags returned in the response of one DescribeTags call and the order of tags returned across the responses of a multiple-call iteration (when using pagination) is unspecified. This operation requires permissions for the elasticfilesystem:DescribeTags action.

parameters.name: FileSystemId
parameters.description: The ID of the file system whose tag set you want to retrieve.

nested_items.name: Marker
nested_items.description: If the request included a Marker, the response returns that value in this field.

nested_items.name: Tags
nested_items.description: Returns tags associated with the file system as an array of Tag objects.

nested_items.name: Key
nested_items.description: The tag key (String). The key can't start with aws:.

nested_items.name: Value
nested_items.description: The value of the tag key.

nested_items.name: NextMarker
nested_items.description: If a value is present, there are more tags to return. In a subsequent request, you can provide the value of NextMarker as the value of the Marker parameter in your next request to retrieve the next set of tags.
